entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 14 April 2023
